snippet: The photographer Danilo Scarpati documents Milan Design Week. Today, a slew of collaborations: Cassina’s newest Maralunga sofa, designed in collaboration with 20 students; Marni’s animal figures; and a group exhibition curated by Rossana Orlandi,...
abstract: The photographer Danilo Scarpati documents Milan Design Week. Today, a slew of collaborations: Cassina’s newest Maralunga sofa, designed in collaboration with 20 students; Marni’s animal figures; and a group exhibition curated by Rossana Orlandi, Vionnet and Audemars Piguet.

headline.main: Photo Diary | Milan Design Week 2014: Cassina, Marni and "Untold"
